div.p: However, in order to compare the evolution of the microstructure and the formation of βphase during casting of alloy produced in the industry we need very rapid quenching experiments of samples (~ 20°C/sec). Therefore we applied for 1 day (3 shifts) time for the additional experiments.

figure.figDesc: Fig. 3D synchrotron tomography of β-phases in casting Al-10Si-0.3Fe commercial alloy: a) several β-phases reconstructed in an investigated volume 297 x 225 x 195 µm³ and b) βphase reconstructed in an investigated volume 147 x 48 x 141 µm³.
